newsitem.title: USA: Autodesk ships new release of AutoCAD.
newsitem.headline: Autodesk ships new release of AutoCAD.

text.p: Autodesk Inc. Friday began shipping a new version of its flagship design software product that could reverse the company's declining sales.

The new version of AutoCAD -- which helps architects and engineers design the guts of buildings and machines -- draws and calculates designs much faster than the previous version, the company said. The AutoCAD Release 14 is also easier to use, according to trade magazines that have tested it.
The new release of AutoCAD also could encourage many of the Autodesk's 1.6 million existing customers to upgrade, which would bolster revenue, said Christine Tsingos, Autodesk vice president.
